text:
LAST FEW HOURS OF THE PROGRAMME!! :scream::grin:

>A gentle reminder to close out your conversations with your E-Mentors and say thank you for their help if you haven't already done so! :smile: :+1:

*Note: You will still have access to the channels with your E-Mentors but no longer able to send them messages as of 23.59pm this evening.*

LAST FEW HOURS OF THE PROGRAMME!! :scream::grin:

>A gentle reminder to close out your conversations with your Mentees and wish them all the best if you haven't already done so! :smile: :+1:


*Note: You will still have access to the channels with your Mentees but no longer able to send them messages as of 23.59pm this evening.*

PLEASE also don't forget to do our quick feedback form link here:  <<<<<<<<<< VERY IMPORTANT FOR US
